title: Handle a Machine Downtime Event
description: A production line has stopped due to a machine fault. The supervisor needs to log the downtime event.

tasks.description: Identify the machine that is down.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects the correct machine from a plant layout map or list.

tasks.description: Log the start time of the downtime event and select a reason code (e.g., 'Mechanical Failure').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully logs the downtime event with the correct reason.

tasks.description: Create a high-priority maintenance request for the downed machine.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates and dispatches a maintenance ticket to the on-call technician.
